title: A multi-stimuli–response metal–organic framework nanopesticide for smart weed control in agriculture
content:
Environ. Sci.: Nano, 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4EN00695J, Paper
Dingyang Zhang, Xueping Guo, Wenhua Rao, Danmei Pan, Fang Cao, Tianyun Zhai, Wenhui Zheng, Yakubu Saddeeq Abubakar, Xiong Guan, Zhi Chen, Xiaohong Pan
Herbicides play an important role in weed control when it comes to ensuring a high and consistent yield in agriculture, but their effectiveness is often compromised by climatic variables.
